meta.name: Media Controls
meta.tagline: Control your music from within Discord
meta.description:
**Configuration required!**
For this extension to work, you must enable which media sources to use.
- To use Spotify, your Spotify account must be linked to your Discord account.
- To use the system media player, you must [build the media fetcher from source](https://github.com/NotNite/my-moonlight-extensions/tree/main/src/mediaControls/media-fetcher) and set the path to the executable.

sources.description: Where to grab media information from

disableBar.description: Disables the bar that shows the song duration at the top of the controls

mediaFetcherPath.description: [Media fetcher only] Path to the media fetcher executable on your system

richPresenceProvidedTitle.description: Will use title string if none is provided by the player

richPresencePausedSuffix.description: Set to an empty string to disable

richPresenceAlbumArtist.description: When applicable. Will display as `<artist> // <album artist>`

richPresenceAssetPlaying.description: Application assets must be their ID, not name. Otherwise use a URL

richPresenceAssetPaused.description: Application assets must be their ID, not name. Otherwise use a URL

richPresenceAssetDefault.description: Application assets must be their ID, not name. Otherwise use a URL

richPresenceLastFm.displayName: Rich Presence -> Fetch artwork from last.fm

richPresenceSpotify.displayName: Rich Presence -> Fetch artwork from Spotify
richPresenceSpotify.description: Requires Spotify to be linked to Discord
